commits.author: Simon Willnauer
commits.sourceNew:
public void testCaptureMiddle() throws Exception {
    testPatterns(
        "foobarbaz",
        new String[] {"^.(.)."},
        new String[] {"o"},
        new int[] {0},
        new int[] {9},
        new int[] {1},
        false
    );
    testPatterns(
        "foobarbaz",
        new String[] {"^.(.)."},
        new String[] {"foobarbaz","o"},
        new int[] {0,0},
        new int[] {9,9},
        new int[] {1,0},
        true
    );

    testPatterns(
        "foo bar baz",
        new String[] {"^.(.)."},
        new String[] {"o","a","a"},
        new int[] {0,4,8},
        new int[] {3,7,11},
        new int[] {1,1,1},
        false
    );

    testPatterns(
        "foo bar baz",
        new String[] {"^.(.)."},
        new String[] {"foo","o","bar","a","baz","a"},
        new int[] {0,0,4,4,8,8},
        new int[] {3,3,7,7,11,11},
        new int[] {1,0,1,0,1,0},
        true
    );
  }
